description.narrative: The expected development impact of the project includes: i) demonstrating the viability of venture investing in Bangladesh, which is expected to have a catalytic effect on the broader venture ecosystem in Bangladesh ii) contributing to the company's financial sustainability and growth iii) job creation in warehousing and logistics.
